Class WeatherAppModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • weather_app_parts.WeatherAppModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class WeatherAppModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is in charge of handling the data from the yr API.
    Author:
    Josefine Bexelius

      • getPlaceData

        public java.lang.String[] getPlaceData(java.lang.String location,
                                       org.w3c.dom.NodeList Places)
        Sets coordinates of the location that is chosen in the view class.
        Parameters:
        location - The city chosen in the GUI
        Places - List of the available places coordinates.
        Returns:
        data A string array contains the citys three coordinates, lon, lat and alt.
